question: show me only those schemes I am eligible for
answer:
Based on your profile, here are the government schemes you are eligible for:

**1. Education Loan Scheme- Credit Line 2 for Minority Community**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to a minority community and your annual family income is within the prescribed limit.
- **Benefits**: Financial assistance for pursuing professional and technical courses.
- **How to Apply**: You need to have a Parivaar Pehchan Patra (PPP ID) and apply through the designated process in Haryana.
- **Official Website**: [Haryana Government](https://haryana.gov.in)

**2. National Agriculture Insurance Scheme**
- **Why You're Eligible**: As a farmer, you can apply for insurance coverage for your crops.
- **Benefits**: Financial protection against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
- **How to Apply**: Non-loanee farmers can apply voluntarily before the crop season deadline.
- **Official Website**: [National Agriculture Insurance](https://www.ncdma.gov.in)

**3. Feed The Seed**
- **Why You're Eligible**: As a farmer, you can participate in seed production for livestock farming.
- **Benefits**: Support for seed production to enhance agricultural productivity.
- **How to Apply**: You need to check with local agricultural offices for application details.
- **Official Website**: Not specified.

If you have any further questions or need assistance with the application process, feel free to ask!

question: Show me schemes I am eligible for
answer:
Based on your profile, here are the government schemes you are eligible for:

**1. Financial Incentive to SC Meritorious Boy Students**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category.
- **Benefits**: Financial support for meritorious SC boy students to encourage education.
- **How to Apply**: Applications will be accepted through the myScheme platform from 04/07/2025 to 31/10/2025. You need to register on DigiLocker first.
- **Official Website**: [myScheme](https://myscheme.gov.in)

**2. Financial Incentive to SC Meritorious Girls Students**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category.
- **Benefits**: Financial support for meritorious SC girl students to encourage education.
- **How to Apply**: Applications will be accepted through the myScheme platform from 04/07/2025 to 31/10/2025. You need to register on DigiLocker first.
- **Official Website**: [myScheme](https://myscheme.gov.in)

**3. Scheme to Encourage Students for Innovative Projects**
- **Why You're Eligible**: As a member of the SC community, you can apply for this scheme aimed at encouraging innovative projects among students.
- **Benefits**: Support for students to develop and implement innovative projects.
- **How to Apply**: Register on the official portal and follow the application steps provided.
- **Official Website**: [Official Portal](#)

If you have any questions or need help with the application process, feel free to ask!

question: find me schemes I am eligible for
answer:
Based on the updated scheme information and your profile, here are the government schemes you are eligible for:

**1. Post Matric Students of Class 11th & 12th (Scheduled Caste)**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category and your family income is below the prescribed limit.
- **Benefits**: Financial assistance for students enrolled in Class 11th or 12th in recognized educational institutions.
- **How to Apply**: You need to provide a valid income certificate and a declaration from your guardian regarding family income.
- **Official Website**: Not specified.

**2. Top Class Education For Scheduled Caste Students**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to the SC category and your family income is below ₹8 Lakh per annum.
- **Benefits**: Financial support for students pursuing studies beyond class 12th in notified institutions.
- **How to Apply**: Applications can be submitted through the designated process for SC students.
- **Official Website**: Not specified.

**3. Education Loan Scheme- Credit Line 2 for Minority Community**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to a minority community and your annual family income is within the prescribed limit.
- **Benefits**: Financial assistance for pursuing professional and technical courses.
- **How to Apply**: You need to have a Parivaar Pehchan Patra (PPP ID) and apply through the designated process in Haryana.
- **Official Website**: [Haryana Government](https://haryana.gov.in)

If you need further assistance or have questions about the application process, feel free to ask!
